title: Championship Gaming Series (CGS) Season 1
description:
Three UK Episodes:

Dave Berry, Emma Griffiths and Keely Hazell present coverage from the UK finals of the Championship Gaming series where 40 of Britain&#039;s best gamers will battle for the chance to represent the UK at the world championships in Los Angeles.


Four World Finals Episodes:

The best gamers in the world battle it out for the title of world champions at the Championship Gaming Series finals in Los Angeles.
They compete for points in five games, to see who will win the top prize of  $500,000 USD.



All these shows have shown on SkyTV in the UK, Eurosport in Europe, and on StarTV and DirecTV channels in Asia and USA
